name: Nyaru's Hell
description:
I'm Ozzy, and I'm a Vtuber who enjoys game design! This is my first bullethell project as well as my first project in Construct 3!

I worked on it on and off over the course of a week to bring you this fangame made for a fellow Vtuber! Her name is Nyaru, and you can find her on Twitter and Twitch! Links are below.

Nyaru's Hell is an (repetitive) survival bullethell with no way to defeat the Tails' Doll itself. Rather, it's about racking up enough points for the high score!

---------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

WASD or ArrowKeys - move
LeftShift - focus
Space - shoot
Q - use bomb

-------------------------------------------

CREDITS:

  1. author:
    1. Auburn "Ozzy" Zephyr
      1. twitter: @vt_ozzy
      2. twitch: vtozzy
  2. characters used:
    1. Nyaru
      1. twitter: @nyaruchuuu
      2. twitch: nyaruchuuu
    2. Tails' Doll (belongs to SEGA)
  3. music:
    1. "Caramellsunshine"
      1. a mashup of
        Caramelldansen and
        Can You Feel The Sunshine

-----------------------------------------------

Tip: if he's stuck, use a bomb when you're available to reset him!
